fields.label: Purpose
fields.description: Ensures safe, healthy, and dignified housing for workers in line with ESTA, BCEA, OHSA, and WIETA/SIZA standards.

fields.label: Legal and Ethical Compliance
options: Extension of Security of Tenure Act (ESTA)

fields.label: Housing Provision and Conditions
options: Adequate space and structure for privacy

fields.label: Hygiene and Sanitation
options: Toilets, washbasins, and bathing areas maintained hygienically
Proper waste disposal systems in place

fields.label: Cooking and Food Preparation
options: Meal arrangements made if no cooking area
Nutritious meals offered if food provided

fields.label: Health and Safety Standards
options: Fire extinguishers and evacuation routes in place

fields.label: Security of Tenure and Rental
options: Rental fees must be reasonable and documented

fields.label: Family and Dependents
options: Families may live with workers if space allows

fields.label: Grievance Procedures
fields.description: Workers may report issues confidentially and management will address concerns promptly.

fields.label: Monitoring and Review
options: Regular inspections for legal and ethical compliance
